title: Step 1
content: Welcome to the ReactJS Framework course! In this first step, we will introduce the basics of ReactJS, including its features and how it works. Here is a video tutorial to get started:

title: Step 2
content: In this step, we will learn how to create React components, which are the building blocks of a React app. Here is a video tutorial to get started:

title: Step 3
content: In this step, we will learn how to manage state in a React app using React hooks. Here is a video tutorial to get started:

title: Step 4
content: In this step, we will learn how to handle user input and events in a React app. Here is a video tutorial to get started:

title: Step 5
content: In this final step, we will learn how to deploy a React app to production. Here is a video tutorial to get started:
